name: Jelly Maze Runner 2D
description:
The game has more than 1000 unique maze levels to traverse while collecting points and evading enemy bugs or zapping them with power ups.

  • Endless Unique Maze Levels that keep expanding in size
  • Increasingly aggressive enemy bugs that monitor the maze per level
  • Power ups for speed and attack

Gameplay:

  • The main goal is to collect all the points inside the maze and avoid or attack bugs to proceed to the next level
  • Collect points and expand the maze
  •  Levels get harder with maze size

*Levels get harder with more enemies

Enjoy the maze puzzles:)
